languages.text: "Род Драйвстем. Я не прощу вам и вашему роду халатность и лживые обвинения рода Версерианов".

traits.locale_text: "Я не прощу вам и вашему роду халатность и лживые обвинения рода Версериан. Абеляр, огласи приговор".

languages.text: "...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."
languages.original_text: "Род Драйвстем. Я не прощу вам и вашему роду халатность и лживые обвинения рода Версерианов".

traits.locale_text: "House Drivestem. I will not forgive your negligence and false accusations of House Werserian."
"House Drivestem. I will not forgive your negligence and false accusations of House Werserian."
"House Drivestem. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you have cast at House Werserian."
"House Drivestem. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you have cast at House Werserian."
"...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."
"...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."

languages.text: 「…ドライブステン家は有罪だ。私はお前の怠慢と、ウェルザリアン家に対する偽りの告訴を許さん」
languages.original_text: "...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: 「…ドライブステン家は有罪だ。私はお前の怠慢と、ウェルザリアン家に対する偽りの告訴を許さん」

languages.text: “德莱夫斯塔家族。我绝不会原谅你们玩忽职守，还试图诬告韦尔森家族的罪过。”
languages.original_text: "...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: “德莱夫斯塔家族。我绝不会原谅你们玩忽职守，还试图诬告韦尔森家族的罪过。”

languages.text: « ... la maison Drivestem coupable. Je ne peux vous pardonner votre négligence, ni d'avoir faussement accusé la maison Werserian. »
languages.original_text: "...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: « ... la maison Drivestem coupable. Je ne peux vous pardonner votre négligence, ni d'avoir faussement accusé la maison Werserian. »

languages.text: «... La casa Drivestem es culpable. No perdonaré vuestra negligencia y las falsas acusaciones que habéis lanzado contra la casa Werserian».
languages.original_text: "...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: «Casa Drivestem. No perdonaré vuestra negligencia y las falsas acusaciones que habéis lanzado contra la casa Werserian».

languages.text: "... Haus Drivestem für schuldig. Ich werde Euch Eure Nachlässigkeit und Eure falschen Anschuldigungen gegen Haus Werserian nicht verzeihen."
languages.original_text: "...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Drivestem. Ich werde Euch Eure Nachlässigkeit und Eure falschen Anschuldigungen gegen Haus Werserian nicht verzeihen."

languages.text: "Drivestem Hanesi suçlu bulunmuştur. İhmalkârlığınızı ve Werserian Hanesi'ne yönelik asılsız ithamlarınızı göz ardı edemem."
languages.original_text: "...House Drivestem guilty. I shall not forgive your negligence and the false accusations you cast against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "...Drivestem Hanesi suçlu bulunmuştur. İhmalkârlığınızı ve Werserian Hanesi'ne yönelik asılsız ithamlarınızı göz ardı edemem."
